quotes.quote: Mistakes are a part of being human. Appreciate your mistakes for what they are: precious life lessons that can only be learned the hard way. Unless it's a fatal mistake, which, at least, others can learn from.
quotes.author: Al Franken

quotes.quote: Anyone nit-picking enough to write a letter of correction to an editor doubtless deserves the error that provoked it.
quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

quotes.quote: Great services are not canceled by one act or by one single error.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: An expert is a person who avoids small error as he sweeps on to the grand fallacy.
quotes.author: Benjamin Stolberg

quotes.quote: Wise men profit more from fools than fools from wise men; for the wise men shun the mistakes of fools, but fools do not imitate the successes of the wise.
quotes.author: Cato the Elder

quotes.quote: We must not say every mistake is a foolish one.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Be not ashamed of mistakes and thus make them crimes.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Laughing at our mistakes can lengthen our own life. Laughing at someone else's can shorten it.
quotes.author: Cullen Hightower

quotes.quote: We're all capable of mistakes, but I do not care to enlighten you on the mistakes we may or may not have made.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: No one who cannot rejoice in the discovery of his own mistakes deserves to be called a scholar.
quotes.author: Donald Foster

quotes.quote: Assert your right to make a few mistakes. If people can't accept your imperfections, that's their fault.
quotes.author: Dr. David M. Burns

quotes.quote: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Experience is that marvelous thing that enables you to recognize a mistake when you make it again.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: It's always helpful to learn from your mistakes because then your mistakes seem worthwhile.
quotes.author: Garry Marshall

quotes.quote: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: While one person hesitates because he feels inferior, the other is busy making mistakes and becoming superior.
quotes.author: Henry C. Link

quotes.quote: She had an unequalled gift... of squeezing big mistakes into small opportunities.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: When you make a mistake, don't look back at it long. Take the reason of the thing into your mind and then look forward. Mistakes are lessons of wisdom. The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
quotes.author: Hugh White

quotes.quote: I have learned throughout my life as a composer chiefly through my mistakes and pursuits of false assumptions, not by my exposure to founts of wisdom and knowledge.
quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

quotes.quote: Any man whose errors take ten years to correct is quite a man.
quotes.author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: Experience teaches slowly and at the cost of mistakes.
quotes.author: James A. Froude

quotes.quote: Mistakes are the portals of discovery.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: If all else fails, immortality can always be assured by spectacular error.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Freedom is not worth having if it does not include the freedom to make mistakes.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There are sadistic scientists who hurry to hunt down errors instead of establishing the truth.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: If you have made mistakes, even serious ones, there is always another chance for you. What we call failure is not the falling down but the staying down.
quotes.author: Mary Pickford

quotes.quote: If I had my life to live over... I'd dare to make more mistakes next time.
quotes.author: Nadine Stair

quotes.quote: Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes that can be made in a very narrow field.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
